code: import React from"react";import Image from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Image";import StyleSheet from"react-native-web/dist/exports/StyleSheet";import*as Yup from"yup";import{AppForm,AppFormField,SubmitButton}from"../components/forms";import Screen from"../components/Screen";var validationScheme=Yup.object().shape({email:Yup.string().required("Vui lòng nhập email").email("Email không hợp lệ").label("Email"),password:Yup.string().required().min(4).label("Password")});function LoginScreen(props){return React.createElement(Screen,{style:styles.container},React.createElement(Image,{style:styles.logo,source:require("../assets/logo-red.png")}),React.createElement(AppForm,{initialValues:{email:"",password:""},onSubmit:function onSubmit(values){alert(JSON.stringify(values));},validationSchema:validationScheme},React.createElement(AppFormField,{name:"email",icon:"email",autoCapitalize:"none",autoCorrect:false,placeholder:"email",keyboardType:"email-address"}),React.createElement(AppFormField,{name:"password",icon:"lock",autoCapitalize:"none",autoCorrect:false,placeholder:"password",secureTextEntry:true}),React.createElement(SubmitButton,{title:"Login"})));}var styles=StyleSheet.create({container:{padding:12},logo:{width:100,height:100,alignSelf:"center",marginTop:50,marginBottom:20}});export default LoginScreen;
